elements.name: bigIpVersion
elements.label: BIG-IP Version
elements.toolTip: F5 BIG-IP version you want to use.

elements.name: imageName
elements.label: BIG-IP Image Name
elements.toolTip: F5 SKU (IMAGE) you want to deploy.

elements.name: vmScaleSetMinCount
elements.label: Minimum Number of BIG-IP VEs
elements.toolTip: The minimum (and default) number of BIG-IP VEs that will be deployed into the VM Scale Set.

elements.name: licensedBandwidth
elements.label: Licensed Bandwidth
elements.toolTip: The amount of licensed bandwidth (Mbps) to allocate for each BIG-IP VE.

elements.name: adminUsername
elements.label: F5 LTM Username
elements.toolTip: Administrative username for the Azure virtual machine(s).

toolTip.password: Administrative password for the Azure virtual machine(s).

elements.name: instanceType
elements.label: Virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for each cluster node.

toolTip.virtualNetwork: Select an existing new virtual network or use the template to create a new one.
toolTip.subnets: Select an existing subnet or use the template to create a new one.

elements.name: storageType
elements.label: Storage Type
elements.toolTip: Select the storage type for your BIG-IP virtual machines.

elements.name: restrictedSrcAddress
elements.label: Restricted source network or address
elements.toolTip: Restricts management access to a specific network or address; enter a IP address or address range in CIDR notation, or asterisk for all sources.

constraints.validationMessage: Only valid CIDR addresses and the wildcard character (asterisk) are allowed.

elements.name: ntpServer
elements.label: NTP Server
elements.toolTip: If you would like to change the NTP server the BIG-IP uses replace the default ntp server with your choice.

constraints.validationMessage: Only valid fully-qualified domain names are allowed.

elements.name: timeZone
elements.label: Time Zone
elements.toolTip: If you would like to change the time zone the BIG-IP uses then enter your choice.

elements.name: vmScaleSetMaxCount
elements.label: VM Scale Set Maximum Count
elements.toolTip: The maximum number of BIG-IP VEs that can be deployed into the VM Scale Set.

elements.name: autoScaleMetric
elements.label: Auto Scale Metric
elements.toolTip: Select the metric on which auto scale events should be triggered. The following parameters determine individual settings for the scaling rules based on the metric you choose. Note: Custom BIG-IP metrics (for use by additional autoscale rules or for device visibility) are sent to Application Insights regardless of the metric you select.

elements.name: appInsightsNewOrExisting
elements.label: New or Existing App Insights
elements.toolTip: Choose a new or existing Application Insights environment.

elements.name: appInsightsName
elements.label: App Insights Name
elements.toolTip: Enter the name of your existing Application Insights environment that will be used to receive custom BIG-IP metrics you can use for Scale Set rules and device visibility.

elements.name: appInsightsGroup
elements.label: App Insights Group
elements.toolTip: Enter the resource group of your existing Application Insights environment that will be used to receive custom BIG-IP metrics you can use for Scale Set rules and device visibility.

elements.name: appInsightsLocation
elements.label: App Insights Location
elements.toolTip: Choose the Azure region of your existing Application Insights environment that will be used to receive custom BIG-IP metrics you can use for Scale Set rules and device visibility.

elements.name: calculatedBandwidth
elements.label: Calculated Bandwidth
elements.toolTip: Specify the amount of bandwidth (in Mbps) that should be used to base the throughput percentage calculation on for scale events. For PAYG, we recommend this matches the parameter **licensedBandwidth**, or at minimum is a lower value. See [Scaling Thresholds](#scaling-thresholds) for more information.

elements.name: scaleOutThreshold
elements.label: VM Scale Set Scale Out Threshold
elements.toolTip: The percentage of 'Network Out' throughput that triggers a Scale Out event.  This is factored as a percentage of the F5 PAYG image bandwidth (Mbps) size you choose.

elements.name: scaleInThreshold
elements.label: VM Scale Set Scale In Threshold
elements.toolTip: The percentage of 'Network Out' throughput that triggers a Scale In event.  This is factored as a percentage of the F5 PAYG image bandwidth (Mbps) size you choose.

elements.name: scaleTimeWindow
elements.label: VM Scale Set Scale Time Window
elements.toolTip: The time window required to trigger a scale event (in and out). This is used to determine the amount of time needed for a threshold to be breached, as well as to prevent excessive scaling events (flapping).

elements.name: tenantId
elements.label: Tenant ID
elements.toolTip: Your Azure service principal application tenant ID.

constraints.validationMessage: Please provide a valid tenant ID for your service prinicipal application.

elements.name: clientId
elements.label: Client ID
elements.toolTip: Your Azure service principal application client ID.

constraints.validationMessage: Please provide a valid client ID for your service prinicipal application.

elements.name: servicePrincipalSecret
elements.label: Secret
elements.toolTip: Your Azure service principal application secret.

constraints.validationMessage: Please provide a valid secret key for your service prinicipal application.

elements.name: customEmail
elements.label: Email for Scale Event Notifications
elements.toolTip: An email address that will receive notifications of scale events.

constraints.validationMessage: Please provide a valid email address.
